name: In Too Deep (Dihara Wijetunga)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48 Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/in-too-deep-1

Take control of Joey as he gets tangled up in the deep machinations of the criminal underworld. His very life on the line, can he uncover the evidence and get to the bottom of the plot or will he end up getting caught?

Changelog

Version 1.01

  • Added options screen to main menu with mouse sensitivity slider for users with sensitivity issues.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

Left Click - Interact

Credits 

Achila (@Curry_Fury1990) - Art, Writing, Level Design, Game Design, Voice Acting

Dihara (@diharaw94) - Programming, Sound Design, UI, Voice Acting

Sithila (@artofsith) - Art, Level Design, VFX, Lighting, Voice Acting
